variable.name: Visit Name
variable.description: Visit number [1 - 10, P1=acute pouchitis visit before antibiotics, P2= acute pouchitis visit after antibiotics]

variable.name: Year of IBD DX
variable.description: Year of inflammatory bowel disease diagnosis

variable.name: Sib CD
variable.description: Number of siblings with Crohn's disease

variable.name: Sib UC
variable.description: Number of siblings with ulcerative colitis

variable.name: Sib Unclear
variable.description: Number of siblings with IBD, unclear if Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis

variable.name: Sib Unaff
variable.description: Number of siblings unaffected by IBD

variable.name: Sib Unknown
variable.description: Number of siblings, history of IBD unknown

variable.name: Off CD
variable.description: Number of offspring with Crohn's disease

variable.name: Off UC
variable.description: Number of offspring with ulcerative colitis

variable.name: Off Unclear
variable.description: Number of offspring with IBD, unclear if Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis

variable.name: Off Unaff
variable.description: Number of offspring unaffected by IBD

variable.name: Off Unknown
variable.description: Number of offspring, history of IBD unknown

variable.name: Tob
variable.description: Smoking at diagnosis or onset of symptoms
variable.comment: Smoking defined as>= 7 cigarettes/day for >= 6 months

variable.name: Tob Year Start
variable.description: If smoker or ex-smoker, year started smoking

variable.name: Tob Year Stop
variable.description: If smoker or ex-smoker, year stopped smoking

variable.name: Left
variable.description: Inflammation extending to the splenic flexure

variable.name: Surg Year Chronic Disease
variable.description: Year of surgery for chronic disease

variable.name: Surg Year Fulm
variable.description: Year of surgery for fulminant disease

variable.name: Surg Dysp/Cancer
variable.description: Indication for surgery = dysplasia or colon cancer

variable.name: Surg Year Dysp/Cancer
variable.description: Year of surgery for dysplasia or colon cancer

variable.name: Hand sewn
variable.description: Ileal pouch anal anastomosis hand sewn

variable.name: EIM
variable.description: Has the patient ever had extraintestinal manifestations

variable.name: Joint
variable.description: Joint symptoms related to disease activity

variable.name: Year Non-GI Cancer
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of non-GI Cancer

variable.name: Year Non-GI Dysp
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of non-GI Dysplasia

variable.name: Year Non-GI Lympho
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of non-GI lymphoproliferative disorder

variable.name: GI Cancer
variable.description: History of GI cancer, excluding colorectal cancer

variable.name: Year GI Cancer
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of GI cancer, excluding colorectal cancer

variable.name: Year GI Lympho
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of lymphoproliferative disorder involving GI system

variable.name: Year Dysp
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of dysplasia of the colon

variable.name: Year CRC
variable.description: Year of diagnosis of colorectal cancer

variable.name: Infert
variable.comment: Infertility defined as the inability to naturally conceive a child or the inability to carry a pregnancy to term

variable.name: Steroids
variable.description: Currently taking corticosteroids, topical or oral

variable.name: 5-ASA
variable.description: Currently taking aminosalicylates, topical or oral

variable.name: PDAI
variable.comment: Pouchitis is defined as a total score of >=7
